page.title: 10Harden Village Societies
page.content: We have many clubs in our village for people to enjoy. They cover a wide range of activities. There are clubs which are of interest to all ages from the play group for the youngest to the Senior Citizens Club for the oldest members of the village. Most of the meetings are held in the Memorial Hall in the local park. Each club has its own committee to arrange visits and activities. The Gala takes place in June and is supported by everyone in the village. Another popular event is the pantomime produced by Harden Players with both children and adults taking part. Teenagers are welcome to the Youth Club where they hold discos and run sport teams. Ladies from the village are also involved in work for the Womens Institute.
